formattedAddress: 2181 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10037, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2181 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10037, USA

originalText.text: We were travelling from Canada to hold an event in New York City that required a photographer.  We searched photographers in the area and sent emails explaining our needs and when.  David Gordon responded to us in timely and professional manner.  We viewed his website of previous events he had covered and was very impressed with his work.  He also offered a great price for what we were looking for.  We booked him well in advance and was glad we did as he told me that he was getting lots of requests for that same day. Having hired David without meeting him, coming from a different country and not knowing for sure how that was going to turn out I took that a good sign!  We communicated via email back and forth many times answering any questions that came up and I felt very comfortable with the process.  David arrived at our event earlier than the hired time to introduce himself and familiarize himself with our event and what was required with respect to our photography.  The evening went very well and he was very professional with our team members as well as our guests.  We had access to our photos in less than a week of our event with very simple download and access instructions.  The photos David took were AMAZING!  Very impressed with the quality as well as the different a creative shots that he took. I would recommend David Gordon Photography in a heartbeat and we would definitely hire him again anytime our event is held in New York!

originalText.text: David has become somewhat of a "family photographer" for my extended clan.  He has shot engagement parties, christenings, bachelor parties and Christmas cards.  His mastery in working with subjects of all ages is really something to behold.  His pricing is exceptionally fair, his turn around time is great, and the work product speaks for itself.  I strongly recommend David Gordon Photograph without reservation.

originalText.text:
David has been photographing our two New York events (conferences and award ceremonies) for several years and we have been delighted with the outcome every time. He responds promptly to any communication and is always friendly and polite.
He has always understood how quickly we need to receive the photos and has never let us down.
I would happily recommend David for anyone requiring an excellent photographer in New York.

originalText.text: David did individual portraits and group photos for a summer high school program that I work for. He was on-time, professional, and took great photographs that we can use on our website and in marketing materials. His turnaround on the images was quick and he is quite responsive to emails and phone calls.

originalText.text:
I hired David for my company event. He was extremely professional and delivered everything he had committed to in the time frame that he had committed to.
He came on time and patiently accommodated all our requests.
The quality of the work was professional and exactly what I expected.
I will definitely hire him again for my next event.
